name: Screen Recorder
description: Introducing the Screen Recorder Chrome extension! This extension offers a convenient way to capture your screen effortlessly. Record your screen activities, download the recorded videos, and easily manage your browser tabs. The extension features a user-friendly interface with a timer and intuitive control buttons for seamless recording control. With a visually appealing design, the extension provides a pleasant experience while ensuring smooth functionality. Enjoy effortless screen recording with the Screen Recorder Chrome extension.
